basics.name: Eliseo Diaz Medina
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: I'm a software developer learning about JS frameworks, web technologies and cross-platform development. I like to keep up to date with the latest technologies and apply best development practices. That is why I am looking for a project and a team in which I can apply everything I have learned. In my spare time I love to take photos and videos.

work.name: EIA Labs
work.summary: We are a group of friends and coworkers that meet in colege and are passionate for the same things. The team are working with multiple technologies, mainly with a FERN stack.
highlights: Building a PWA for medical professionals
Tani is a comprehensive billing system for the healthcare environment.

work.name: Ministerio de Desarrollo Social
work.description: Worked as an IT specialist, providing web solutions, design and support.
work.summary: The governmental institution serves people in vulnerable situations and creates employability conditions for development with equity.

volunteer.summary: Worked in Tucuman settlements to address housing and habitat problems.

education.institution: Universidad Tecnologica Nacional - Facultad Reginal de Tucuman

projects.name: Tani
projects.description: Tani is our first major project for a client. It mainly provides an accounting and statistics solution to professionals and people in the medical environment.
highlights: Using modern technologies such as React, Firestore and Firebase Functions

projects.name: GuenCuero
projects.description: It is an e-commerce website for products made for field work.
highlights: Using modern technologies such as React, Mongo, Strapi and AS3 Bucket

projects.name: SnakeJS
projects.description: A classic snake like game made in vanilla JS.
highlights: Plain vanilla JavaScript, and canvas for draw animation
